巴打學ML 黎做乜？

做緊big data既research

講多啲ok嘛？有啲好奇

巴打學ML 黎做乜？

做緊big data既research

講多啲ok嘛？有啲好奇

Big data 資料好大，而且keep住增加，用ML黎搞有好過傳統個啲加加減減，同埋搵一啲data與data之間一啲correlation ml易搵啲，應該係啦，我都未開始，講唔到咁多
ml 姐係 make love？

我諗你不妨睇下呢度：
https://github.com/vhf/free-programming-books/blob/master/free-programming-books.md

巴打學ML 黎做乜？

做緊big data既research

講多啲ok嘛？有啲好奇

Big data 資料好大，而且keep住增加，用ML黎搞有好過傳統個啲加加減減，同埋搵一啲data與data之間一啲correlation ml易搵啲，應該係啦，我都未開始，講唔到咁多


Data 越多越多 noise
Feature engineering 會係 machine learning 中最花時間嘅一部分
好多 machine learning algorithms 其實都唔係好新嘅理念
其中一個問題係好多machine learning algorithms 係 supervised learning
而好多data 本身嘅 meta data 都唔齊

如果放哂data 入去就可以搵到 correlation 班 data scientists 會失業

仲有 machine learning is not great at predicting the future 因為好多嘢 例如 911 machine learning 根本冇可能預計到

同埋有時個model 太複雜好難 operationize

其實好多公司啲 data , system, process, culture 都未可以用到 big data / machine learning

你口中嘅 big data 愈聽愈 cliche

巴打學ML 黎做乜？

做緊big data既research

講多啲ok嘛？有啲好奇

Big data 資料好大，而且keep住增加，用ML黎搞有好過傳統個啲加加減減，同埋搵一啲data與data之間一啲correlation ml易搵啲，應該係啦，我都未開始，講唔到咁多


Data 越多越多 noise
Feature engineering 會係 machine learning 中最花時間嘅一部分
好多 machine learning algorithms 其實都唔係好新嘅理念
其中一個問題係好多machine learning algorithms 係 supervised learning
而好多data 本身嘅 meta data 都唔齊

如果放哂data 入去就可以搵到 correlation 班 data scientists 會失業

同埋有時個model 太複雜好難 operationize

其實好多公司啲 data , system, process, culture 都未可以用到 big data / machine learning

你口中嘅 big data 愈聽愈 cliche


我剩係知用ml黎process multiple dimensions 既野快啲咋 有錯勿屌，不過突然諗到一樣野就係用ml做dimensions reduction


Dimension reduction / feature selection / feature reduction 通常係 ML 做 model 前其中步驟

因為太多 feature 會 train 得太慢同埋有機會 overfit

本意係減少 noise, overfitting, and the effect of correlated features

通常做 PCA 之類 搵出邊啲 feature 冇用或者睇 regression p value 之類揀。ML 好多時其實都係 stat 嘢

所以見到你講ML 同 correlation 好奇搭咀，因為我以爲ML 本身唔係用嚟做 feature selection, etc. 而反之 feature selection, etc. 係 ML 入邊一個重要步驟

有錯勿屌

咁所有 classification clustering regression etc algorithms 同 其他 techniques 都係 tools 啫
至於幾時用點用點解用有乜 implications and trade off 就睇到真功夫

唔通用個 hyperparameter tuning 加 xgboosted 做普通 classification on tabular data 就話自己係 data scientist 咩 見好多 competitions 頭幾名都係用同一個 algorithm. Feature engineering 好多時就係關鍵所在 當tools 咁學應該好難去到咁top

本身唔係maths/stats底, 點食呢?! 理論上冇可能短時間(e.g.幾個月)內學識/明ML/DL, 除非係天才啦! 仲有, 識用啲tools唔等於知幾時先啱用(情況如大把人識algorithms, 但就極少人識邊乜嘢情況下用邊種algorithm!), 啲tools仲要背後一大堆assumptions, 出嚟嘅results又subject to interpretation. 個個都好似以為睇完youtube啲教學片, 跟住做幾次就話自己識ML/DL, 真係唔知好嬲定好笑喇!

multivariable calculus, Differential equation有冇學

linear algebra multivariable calculus就基本一定要識啦 講緊要識proof果隻 跟住probability and statistics就linear regression果堆要識啦 同埋distributions果啲 都係要識啲proof野啦 咁樣你學ridge regression同SVM都易上手

不過ML係建基於math同stat 識得越多越好 係睇你學幾深既ML

K-means clustering又好, PCA又好, 呢啲咪又係stats嚟, 但啲U唔會特登開科ML嚟教呢啲囉, 最多咪group入data mining!

Data mining實在啲
ML既定位仲係好模糊，無嘜人識定個課程

Ml我知係咩，其實咩係data mining

Analysis of dependence between variable

咁 feature engineering, hyperparameter optimization, cross validation ensemble techniques, boosting algorithms 之類應該唔算太 pure stats 啩

ML 定位係有少少vague
但都主要係 用scientific method 不斷搵個 generalized model 去做 anomaly detection classification regression or clustering ？
Stats 就係主要嚟衡量你個 model 嘅工具
而大部分algorithm 都會用到 stats

Econ 都好多數計 但唔會話係 math 科啩

The fundamental difference between statistics and machine learning is that statistical learning involves forming a hypothesis before we build a model. Model fitting and then model diagnostic are performed subsequently. If we reject the initial hypothesis, we may need to start over again.

In machine learning, the algorithms are directly run without any specific assumptions or hypotheses. The models learn the data without any user-imposed conditions.

咁 feature engineering, hyperparameter optimization, cross validation ensemble techniques, boosting algorithms 之類應該唔算太 pure stats 啩

ML 定位係有少少vague
但都主要係 用scientific method 不斷搵個 generalized model 去做 anomaly detection classification regression or clustering ？

而大部分algorithm 都會用到 stats

Econ 都好多數計 但唔會話係 math 科啩

The fundamental difference between statistics and machine learning is that statistical learning involves forming a hypothesis before we build a model. Model fitting and then model diagnostic are performed subsequently. If we reject the initial hypothesis, we may need to start over again.

In machine learning, the algorithms are directly run without any specific assumptions or hypotheses. The models learn the data without any user-imposed conditions.

That only applies to end-to-end deep learning model but not machine learning in general

Not practical as in too expensive or no right resources (human resource or tech)
Airbnb Amazon Netflix Walmart 呢啲大公司就話啫
有幾多普通公司可以用到？
養team data scientists 都好貴
唔好講ML 就算連 ERP CRM 呢啲算係 mature 嘅產品好多公司都用唔到 full potential. Implementation 好多時都亂嚟

Off the shelf product ML/ big data (Hadoop stack + some etl data visualization and limited prediction )都已經幾貴(total cost of ownership)同埋未算 mature
下下幾百萬除非真係 critical to business strategy 個ROI 唔喺度
公司cultural 都好煩 directors VP 會以為係 silver bullet 乜都解決到 但internal support and budget 又唔夠
好多managers 又會擔心data 會指出佢哋一直做錯嘢未必好合作
data governance ， process 之類未準備好其實上唔到 big data or ML
你計埋計埋普通公司根本冇可能justify 呢個 risk 住
因為仲係太貴

總會有日會平啲同實用啲嘅 我估

你呢

下下幾百萬除非真係 critical to business strategy 個ROI 唔喺度
公司cultural 都好煩 directors VP 會以為係 silver bullet 乜都解決到 但internal support and budget 又唔夠
好多managers 又會擔心data 會指出佢哋一直做錯嘢未必好合作
data governance ， process 之類未準備好其實上唔到 big data or ML
你計埋計埋普通公司根本冇可能justify 呢個 risk 住
因為仲係太貴

總會有日會平啲同實用啲嘅 我估

我唔係做trade
你呢

我做vision
Ml平時最多用下svm random forest with hand craft feature

Deep leaning 知基本結構原理，但未試過practical 用

巴打做咩

咁 feature engineering, hyperparameter optimization, cross validation ensemble techniques, boosting algorithms 之類應該唔算太 pure stats 啩

ML 定位係有少少vague
但都主要係 用scientific method 不斷搵個 generalized model 去做 anomaly detection classification regression or clustering ？
Stats 就係主要嚟衡量你個 model 嘅工具
而大部分algorithm 都會用到 stats

Econ 都好多數計 但唔會話係 math 科啩

大部份人講ML, 其實係講緊pattern recognition / statistical modeling / probabilistic modelling


大部份人講 as in general public or those in the know?

我接觸到多數都係講ML 應用多
我估
Anomaly detection (chances of default, etc.)
Classification (lead scoring, etc)
Regression (time series prediction etc )
都算係 pattern / probabilistic modelling

基本上 supervised algorithm 睇你啲 label 做 example 去做 prediction. 乜程度人都係用呢個方法學習 不過ML 可以快 有系統 同埋有數據支持多好多

deep learning etc still not practical for commercialized uses saved for a handful of tech companies I guess. 總會有日會 accessible 啲？

Deep learning點會still not practical

問題係你有冇人才同data去搞

Time series prediction ,巴打搞ml trading
